item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 logged its fifth straight losing session on Thursday, while the Nasdaq Composite tumbled for a third day. What's on CNBC's radar going int...

item.title: Avoid these stocks that saw ‘double misses’ this earnings season, Wolfe Research warns
item.description: Potential sell candidates, according to the Wall Street researcher, include Southwest Airlines and Lockheed Martin.

item.title: These names have solid cash flows and are buying back stock, Jefferies says
item.description: Share buyback announcements for S&P 500 companies are up this year, and a few companies can help boost portfolios, the firm said.

item.title: Mastercard is testing its all-time highs and on the verge of a big move, charts suggest
item.description: Chart analyst David Keller takes a look at Mastercard's charts.

item.title: UnitedHealth makes Goldman’s coveted hedge fund VIP basket that’s up 15% this year
item.description: The VIP basket has outperformed the S&P 500 this year with a gain of 15%, compared to the S&P 500′s advance of more than 8%.
